attributes.review: I got this app to support are beutiful orange Cheetoe of a presedent 😻. ONLY TO BE HACKEDD!!!! don’t download this app he will hack you and wipe out your phone🙄. So I got a new phone and downloaded the app again just to write this reveiw and spread awareness 🙈. SO WHATEVER YOU DO DONT DOWNLOAD the app you will get hacked😃😒. Your welcome for this very helpful information😁❤️
attributes.title: I got hacked😒

attributes.review: This thing took 90 weeks to download and accessed all my data and proceeded to send me a text telling me that I am now required to vote for trump and if I don’t they’re gonna kill my phone and then gain access to all the other stuff in my house. This app is shadyyyyy
attributes.title: LITERALLY THE WORST

attributes.review: App doesn’t load half the time and when it does it only works for up to ten m. And during that time many thing are unusable and glitchy can’t believe this got approved.
attributes.title: Poor quality

attributes.review: This app was absolutely terrible! I was horrified about how slow it was and i think it gave my phone a virus🤮Who ever let this app reach the app store needs to be fired immediately!!! Needless to say 1 star is a gross overstatement for this app if i could i would give it -5!
attributes.title: Disappointment!!

attributes.review: I’d give it -1000 stars if I could. The app started sending me messages telling me I was fat and that my mother was a Karen. Told me I should look into dieting. Not to mention it took about 124 days to download! It was so excruciating to wait that long just to be told you’re fat! Disgusting!
attributes.title: I’m disgusted!

attributes.review: ok so i downloaded this app in hopes of being up to date with our orange lovely president donald tramp but it crashed as soon as i downloaded 😡 makes me think the haters don’t want us to see his great messages for this trump loving country👁👄👁 anyways i tried to open it once again and my home got raided by the trumpettes🌚 oh the pain. this app went from ooga to booga 🤢 although having all these issues i would give y’all an e for effort 💗✨🧚🏼‍♂️but in this case its for execution 🦋🥰💫
attributes.title: oh wow so disappointing

attributes.review: worst app ever. I was hoping for something helpful, instead I got the opposite. it was glitching everytime I opened the app, my phone got 23 viruses, and the app was just plain out useless. I would never recommend this app even if this was the last app on the AppStore 🧚🏼‍♂️🥰✨🦋
attributes.title: no ❤️

attributes.review: I tried to download this app to my phone a week ago and it made my phone TURN OFF and it wouldn't come back on. Took it to get checked and the people said they had no idea what happened and that it could have been a FOREIGN VIRUS!!!! I had to buy a whole NEW phone and am extremely UPSET AND BETRAYED BY MR. TRUMP
attributes.title: I AM OUTRAGED

attributes.review: it was supposed to show trump, but all i see is a cheeto? it needs to be fixed. aka, it needs to be GONE❤️ i will never understand how this app is still up. delete it please, i have had troubles with everything 🧚‍♂️😘💅
attributes.title: bro please just stop what you’re doing🤩💕

attributes.review: this app almost gave my phone a virus!!! As soon as i opened it it asked for my personal info and WHERE I LIVED?!! I am extremely dissatisfied with the app and the creators, i expected FARRRR better but i got THIS. this app needs to be DELETED, it is so useless and unhelpful, it is literally going to gather my personal info and HACK INTO MY PHONE!!! WORST APP EVER NEVER DOWNLAD!!!!!!!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!
